settings.heading: How does long shipping take?
settings.row_content: Shipping usually takes 3-5 business days with standard delivery, 2 business days for priority, and next business day for overnight shipping. Delivery speed depends on which option you choose at checkout, and processing times may be longer for free shipping promotions or orders placed on weekends

settings.heading: How long will it take to ship my order?
settings.row_content: Orders are usually shipped within 1 business day after purchase. Standard shipping typically takes 3-5 business days, while express options deliver faster. Orders placed on weekends or during free shipping promotions may take an extra day or two to process and ship.

settings.heading: What are the sizing  specs of my order?
settings.row_content: You can find the sizing specs for your order on the product page under the "Specs" or "Size Guide" section. Each bag or accessory lists measurements, capacity, and material details—simply check the product description for the exact dimensions before checkout.

settings.heading: i'm having an issue placing an order.
settings.row_content:
If you're having trouble placing an order, try these quick solutions:

  • Make sure all required fields (shipping address, payment info) are filled in correctly.
  • Refresh the page or clear your browser cache and cookies, then try again.
  • Ensure your payment method is valid and not expired.
  • If the problem continues, contact customer support using the website’s help or live chat for immediate assistance.​

Most checkout issues are solved by a quick refresh or updating card details. If there’s a technical error, support can help or process your order directly.

settings.heading: I'd like to return or replace my order.
settings.row_content: To return or replace your order, visit the Returns & Refunds or Help section on the store’s website, where you’ll find a step-by-step return request form and eligibility details. Most brands require the item to be unused and sent back within 30 days, with original packaging—once received, your replacement or refund will be processed promptly.

settings.heading: I'd like to cancle my order.
settings.row_content: To cancel your order, contact customer support as soon as possible using the help form or live chat on the website. If your order hasn’t shipped yet, they can process your cancellation and issue a refund quickly; if it has already shipped, you may need to complete a return once it arrives

settings.text: We’re here to help. If you couldn’t find the information you were looking for, please reach out to us directly. Our team is eager to assist you.
